TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in PERSON . He is represented before the Court by Mr J. Vyroubal , a lawyer practising in PERSON . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) are represented by their Agent , Mr V.A. Schorm , ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant ’s daughter brought proceedings for damages against the CARDINAL medical institutions before ORG ( okresní soud ) . She was represented before the court by the applicant .
DATE ORG took a number of procedural steps . On DATE and DATE respectively , it held CARDINAL hearings . DATE further procedural steps were carried out .
On DATE ORG held a hearing .
During the period from DATE the case of the applicant ’s daughter continued to be dealt with by the courts .
On DATE the applicant ’s daughter reached majority .
On DATE ORG held a hearing .

On DATE the applicant , acting in his daughter ’s name , withdrew the action as a consequence of delays in the proceedings . On DATE ORG discontinued the proceedings . Its decision became effective on DATE .
